title: CloudCannon build info
description: Normalised build output information for sites across different static site generators.

time.description: The time this file was created.

name.description: The name of the plugin or extension that created this file.

version.description: The version of the plugin or extension that created this file.

name.description: The name of the static site generator used to build the site.

version.description: The version of the static site generator used to build the site.

environment.description: The environment in which the site was built.

metadata.description: Metadata about some of the tools used to build this site.

markdown.description: The engine used to render markdown files.

collections.description: Supporting information about the structured content groups on your site.

additionalProperties.description: A structured content group of files.

path.description: The source path to this file. Should be empty or not start with a slash.

url.description: The output URL for this file.

name.description: Used as a label for this file within the editor.

title.description: Title for the content in the file. Used in place of name if name is unset or same as filename.

_unlisted.description: Hides this item within the editor. Defaults to false.

output.description: Indicates whether or not this file is in the build output. Defaults to true.

published.description: Indicates if this file is published or a draft. Defaults to true.

_options.description: CloudCannon input options to configure front matter inputs for this file.

_comments.description: CloudCannon comments to set helper labels for front matter inputs for this file.
